body.bibl: Brock, Sebastian P. “Identity, Language, Poetic Theology, Literature: What Does This Mean for the Diaspora?” In Identity and Witness: Syriac Christians of the Middle East and India between Homeland and Global Presence, edited by Dietmar W.
